Description: Fragment of neck and strap handle of a pottery transport amphora. Clay fine, very micaceous, mid red-brown. Repaired; four drilled holes preserved.
Curator's comments: The handle is rather too flat and too micaceous perhaps for a Samian origin. Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.045)
